definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Research on the epidemiologic characteristics and risk factors of arsenic-induced skin cancer were reviewed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文系综论皮肤砷癌的流行病学特做与危险因子。

sentences.english: The system was fit for investigation about large samples of epidemiology.
sentences.chinese: 它可供进行大样本流行病学调查时应用。

sentences.english: At the same time authors examined the local inhabitants with interdermal test, IHA and ELIS…
sentences.chinese: 并就血清免疫学检查在流行病学上的意义进行了探讨。

sentences.english: A survey on the epidemiology of Leucocytozoonosis in chicken was carried out during1985-1988 in Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告福建省鸡住白虫病的流行病学调查结果。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the epidemiological feature of Yunnan Endemic Fulminating Myocarditis(YEFM).
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找云南地方性暴发性心肌炎流行病学规律。

sentences.english: CDC WONDER - general purpose warehouse of public health data sets for the epidemiologist.
sentences.chinese: 为流行病学家提供的大众健康数据库。

sentences.english: Epidemiological research also found evidence of malnutrition in people with dementia.
sentences.chinese: 流行病学研究也发现失智症患者营养不良的证据。

sentences.english: WALTHAM has contributed to the body of epidemiological data on canine obesity.
sentences.chinese: 威豪为提供犬类肥胖问题的流行病学数据做出了贡献。

sentences.english: WHO is assisting with the epidemiological analysis and in improving preparedness and response.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织正在协助流行病学分析以及改进防备和应对。

sentences.english: The system could also record data for epidemiological studies.
sentences.chinese: 该系统也可以为流行病学研究记录数据。

sentences.english: Methods All the data of the epidemic station of the incidence of primary school students fever in Yuzhou in recent was analyzed by descriptive epidemiology.
sentences.chinese: 方法对两起小学生群体发热事件进行流行病学调查。

sentences.english: They report the finding in the latest issue of the journal Epidemiology.
sentences.chinese: 他们将此发现发布在了最近一期的流行病学杂志上。

sentences.english: Beral is director of the cancer epidemiology unit of Oxford University.
sentences.chinese: 蓓拉尔是牛津大学癌症流行病学小组的主任。

sentences.english: What is the epidemiology and impact of colorectal cancer in high-incidence countries?
sentences.chinese: 在结直肠癌高发国中其流行病学和影响是怎样的？

sentences.english: Objective To find out Langfang regional epidemiological feature of peptic ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解廊坊地区消化性溃疡病流行病学特点。

sentences.english: There is no epidemiological evidence supporting airborne spread between humans.
sentences.chinese: 尚无流行病学证据支持人之间通过空气传播。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1

definition: World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]
